api_key.name: API key for your square account
api_key.description: The API key for a Square application

start_date.name: Starting date for synchronization
start_date.description: The start date to sync data. Format: YYYY-MM-DD.

is_sandbox.name: Use sandbox account?
is_sandbox.description: Determines the sandbox (true) or production (false) API version

include_deleted_objects.name: Include deleted objects?
include_deleted_objects.description: In some streams there is and option to include deleted objects (Items, Categories, Discounts, Taxes)
